snippet: A campaign spokesman says Newt Gingrich will continue to examine Mitt Romney's record as a corporate takeover specialist.
abstract: A campaign spokesman says Newt Gingrich will continue to examine Mitt Romney's record as a corporate takeover specialist.
lead_paragraph: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- Newt Gingrich's campaign on Wednesday denied a report that he was backing away from attacking Mitt Romney over his career as a corporate takeover specialist at Bain Capital.

headline.main: Gingrich Denies He's Backing Off Attacks on Romney
